newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA'S TMA IN FUND DEAL WITH MERRILL LYNCH.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA'S TMA IN FUND DEAL WITH MERRILL LYNCH.

text.p: Investment company TMA Investment Products on Tuesday announced an agreement granting it the right to distribute Merrill Lynch Asset Management offshore international mutual funds to South African investors.
The partnering would provide its clients with access to over 35 international money market, equity and bond portfolios, it said in a statement.
Merrill Lynch would provide training, marketing and support to TMA's international network of investment intermediaries, it added.

TMA chief executive Andre Immelman said the company was exploring other world markets where company research had shown that technologies which TMA used would enable it to bring investment capabilities to other international markets.

"TMA also intends to expand its range of international products beyond the horizon of international mutual funds and to facilitate asset swap arrangements for its domestic institutional business," Immelman said.
